website_summaries.verdict: A simple and attractive set of beer glasses particularly well suited for Belgian beer and craft brews.
pros: Rounded bowl is specifically designed to improve aroma and flavor while
Tapered top accommodates generous, frothy heads
Weighty and solid construction is durable, and adds to the uniquely sophisticated yet comfortable feel of these glasses
cons: Some who prefer a more dainty glass may feel they're a bit too rugged
A few owners gripe about size discrepancies, siting they don't hold a full 16 oz

customer_reviews.title: Quality glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as a gift. He is an avid craft beer drinker and he absolutely loved these! They are the perfect size for one bottle or can of beer. customer_reviews.title: These are swell
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses with good heft! Perfect for drinking your fancy beer or really anything you want to drink and smell a lot of. These seem sturdy but we'll see if they stand the test of time! A word of warning though, if these arrive damaged, you'll have to return all of them if you want a replacement or refund, as these aren't sold directly from Amazon.

product_meta.title: Libbey Craft Brews Classic Belgian Beer Glasses, 16-ounce, Set of 4
product_meta.description: Color:Set of 4 (16 oz)This 16 ounce capacity clear beer glass works great for Saison, Lambic and Fruit Beer. The tulip stem elevates the beer so your hands are away from the brew, helping to maintain a more constant temperature. The narrow top traps the head and aroma of the beer. It is part of the Libbey Craft Brews collection. Each glass is 7-7/8” tall and 3-3/4” in diameter. They are dishwasher safe and made in Portugal.
feature_bullets: Specially designed for serving Belgian ale, stemmed tulip-shaped glasses are equally stylish and functional
Ideal gift for the craft brew lover who appreciates how a type-specific contour enhances the experience of beer drinking
Includes 4, 16-ounce stemmed Belgian ale beer glasses
Lead-free. Securely packaged in shipping box; always wash prior to use as orders fulfilled by Libbey are shipped directly from manufacturer's warehouse
Durable and dishwasher safe for quick, easy cleanup; to help preserve your products, please refer to the Libbey website for care and handling instructions
